Constructors

Renderable(Mesh, Transform, Material)

Initializes a new Renderable using a single transform and a specific material.

public Renderable(Mesh mesh, Transform transform, Material material)

Parameters

mesh Mesh

The mesh to render.

transform Transform

The transform applied to the renderable.

material Material

The material used for rendering.

Renderable(Mesh, Transform, bool)

Initializes a new Renderable using a single transform and optionally a cloned mesh material.

public Renderable(Mesh mesh, Transform transform, bool copyMeshMaterial = false)

Parameters

mesh Mesh

The mesh to render.

transform Transform

The transform applied to the renderable.

copyMeshMaterial bool

If true, clones the mesh material for independent modification.

Renderable(Mesh, Transform[], Material)

Initializes a new Renderable using one or more transforms and a specific material.

public Renderable(Mesh mesh, Transform[] transforms, Material material)

Parameters

mesh Mesh

The mesh to render.

transforms Transform[]

The transforms applied to the renderable, where providing more than one transform enables instanced rendering.

material Material

The material used for rendering.

Renderable(Mesh, Transform[], bool)

Initializes a new Renderable using one or more transforms and optionally a cloned mesh material.

public Renderable(Mesh mesh, Transform[] transforms, bool copyMeshMaterial = false)

Parameters

mesh Mesh

The mesh to render.

transforms Transform[]

The transforms applied to the renderable, where providing more than one transform enables instanced rendering.

copyMeshMaterial bool

If true, clones the mesh material for independent modification.

Fields

Material

The material used for rendering.

public Material Material

Field Value

Material

Transforms

The transforms applied to the renderable, where providing more than one transform enables instanced rendering.

public Transform[] Transforms

Field Value

Transform[]

Properties

BoneMatrices

Optional array of bone matrices for skinned meshes.

public Matrix4x4[]? BoneMatrices { get; }

Property Value

Matrix4x4[]

InstanceCount

Number of instances (transforms) to draw.

public uint InstanceCount { get; }

Property Value

uint

IsInstanced

True if this renderable should be drawn multiple times with different transforms.

public bool IsInstanced { get; }

Property Value

bool

Mesh

The mesh associated with this renderable object.
